select AREA_INFO.ID, AREA_INFO.AREA_NAME, AREA_INFO.AREA_NAME_ALIAS, -- AREA_INFO.CO_ID, AREA_INFO.CO_NAME, AREA_INFO.A11_CODE, AREA_INFO.A11_CODE_FATHER, -- AREA_INFO.REMARK, -- AREA_INFO.MARK, AREA_INFO.STIME, -- FACTORY_INFO.ID F_ID, -- FACTORY_INFO.NAME F_NAME, -- FACTORY_INFO.A11_CODE_FATHER F_A11_CODE_FATHER, METERING_STATION_COUNT, CHARGE_WELL_COUNT, CHARGE_WELL_COUNT ONLINE_WELL_COUNT from
AREA_INFO -- left join FACTORY_INFO on AREA_INFO.CO_ID = FACTORY_INFO.ID left join (select AREA_ID, count(1) METERING_STATION_COUNT from STATION_INFO where STATION_TYPE = 1 group by AREA_ID) a on AREA_INFO.ID = a.AREA_ID left join (select AREA_ID, count(1) CHARGE_WELL_COUNT from WELL_INFO where W_PROPERTY = 0 group by AREA_ID) b on AREA_INFO.ID = b.AREA_ID
order by AREA_INFO.AREA_NAME

select AREA_INFO.ID, AREA_INFO.AREA_NAME, AREA_INFO.AREA_NAME_ALIAS, AREA_INFO.CO_ID, -- AREA_INFO.CO_NAME, AREA_INFO.A11_CODE, AREA_INFO.A11_CODE_FATHER -- AREA_INFO.REMARK, -- AREA_INFO.MARK, -- AREA_INFO.STIME, -- FACTORY_INFO.ID F_ID, -- FACTORY_INFO.A11_CODE_FATHER F_A11_CODE_FATHER -- FACTORY_INFO.NAME F_NAME from AREA_INFO -- left join FACTORY_INFO on AREA_INFO.CO_ID = FACTORY_INFO.ID where AREA_INFO.id = #{id}
